bands.name: lat
bands.description: latitude

bands.name: lon
bands.description: longitude

bands.name: poly_TSM_Vantrepotte_TSM_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of total suspended matter obtained using GloboLakes-tuned Vantrepotte et al. 2011 algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: blended_chla_top_3_weighted
bands.description: concentration of chlorophyll-a blended from the per-pixel three highest scoring optical water types derived from Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance and tuning in GloboLakes

bands.name: blended_tsm_top_3_weighted
bands.description: concentration of TSM blended from the per-pixel three highest scoring optical water types derived from Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance and tuning in GloboLakes

bands.name: blended_dominant_owt
bands.description: optical water type class number with the heighest membership score
bands.geophysicalUnit: obtained using GloboLakes fuzzy classification and Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: blended_trophic_state
bands.description: trophic state index derived with Calimnos blending of chlorophyll-a algorithms tuned in the GloboLakes project

bands.name: blended_turbidity
bands.description: turbidity derived with Calimnos optical water type dependant blending of total suspended matter or turbidity algorithms as tuned in the GloboLakes project

bands.name: blended_chla_top_3_weighted_validity
bands.description: relative weight of optical water type scores used in blending

bands.name: blended_tsm_top_3_weighted_validity
bands.description: relative weight of optical water type scores used in blending

bands.name: blended_chla_from_predominant_owt
bands.description: concentration of chlorophyll-a following the algorithm associated with the highest scoring optical water type in the whole water body derived from Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance and tuning in GloboLakes

bands.name: blended_tsm_from_predominant_owt
bands.description: concentration of TSM following the algorithm associated with the highest scoring optical water type in the whole water body derived from Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance and tuning in GloboLakes

bands.name: poly_TSM_Zhang_TSM_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of total suspended matter obtained using GloboLakes-tuned Zhang et al. 2014 algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: poly_QAA_Mishra_phycocyanin_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of phycocyanin derived using the Mishra et al 2013 QAA algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: poly_QAA_Mishra_chla_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of chlorophyll-a derived using the the Limnades-tuned Mishra et al 2013 QAA algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: poly_QAA_Mishra_chla_C7_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of chlorophyll-a derived using the Limnades-tuned (cluster 7) Mishra et al 2013 QAA algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: poly_TSM_Nechad_865_Turb_Calimnos
bands.description: turbidity in FNU determined using the algorithms defined by Nechad et al. (2009;2010) using the 865nm band

bands.name: poly_oc2_chla_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of chlorophyll-a derived with the GloboLakes-tuned OC2Ev6 algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance

bands.name: poly_TSM_Nechad_665_Turb_Calimnos
bands.description: turbidity in FNU determined using the algorithms defined by Nechad et al. (2009;2010) using the 665nm band

bands.name: poly_TSM_Binding_TSM_Calimnos
bands.description: concentration of total suspended matter obtained using GloboLakes-tuned Binding et al. 2010 algorithm applied to Polymer atmospherically corrected reflectance
